channel.title: Need help coding xp!
channel.description: i was wondering if anyone can give me code to code xp every time u do dmg im looking for about 1k xp for ea hit u know what i mean.

item.title: Need help coding xp!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[code]Here,

inCombat(); if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); actionTimer = 7; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType); }

Change:code(400 * hitDiff);[/code]
To:code(1000 * hitDiff);[/code]

And:code(300 * hitDiff);[/code]
Tocode(1000 * hitDiff);[/code]

Hope it helped.[/code]

Read full topic
